title: What is it like to teach kindergarten? - Quora

response.answer_text: My dad loves it. It’s like teaching little children really, he explains. Being in that position of trust, to provide opportunities for learning and bonding with the little ones are part of his job description. He teaches them English once a week both classes. Seeing them mature and develop is part of the territory as well. Every year some end up in his first grade classes. They’re energetic and young and passionate to learn additionally. A change of clothing is not a option.

It was inspiring to see children so eager to come to school and learn.  Being prepared to provide meaningful experiences that were fun was par for the course.  Having a change of clothing was always wise for the children and oneself, too!
